hibernate-mapping.query: select new redto (re.RegisterNo, re.ToAccountNo, re.ToName, re.Amount, re.IssueDate, re.Currency ) from TLMORM00001 as re where re.RegisterNo=:registerNo and re.Active = true

select new redto ( re.RegisterNo, re.Ebank, re.Br_Alias, re.Amount, re.ToAccountNo, re.ToName, re.ToNRC, re.ToAddress, re.Name, re.NRC ) from TLMORM00001 as re where re.RegisterNo=:registerNo and re.SourceBranchCode =:branchno and re.Active = true

select new redto ( re.RegisterNo, re.Ebank, re.ToAccountNo, re.ToName, re.Amount, re.Currency, re.AccountSign, re.SourceBranchCode ) from TLMORM00001 as re where (re.IssueDate = null or re.IssueDate = '') and (re.ToAccountNo <> :istoAcctno) and substring(re.ToAccountNo,1,2) <> :toAcctno and re.SourceBranchCode =:sourceBr and re.Active = true order by re.RegisterNo

select new redto ( re.RegisterNo, re.Ebank, re.ToAccountNo, re.ToName, re.Amount, re.Currency, re.AccountSign, re.SourceBranchCode ) from TLMORM00001 as re where (re.IssueDate = null or re.IssueDate = '') and (re.ToAccountNo = null or re.ToAccountNo = '' or re.ToAccountNo = :istoAcctno) and re.SourceBranchCode =:sourceBr and re.Active = true order by re.RegisterNo
update TLMORM00001 re set re.IssueDate=:issueDate, re.UpdatedUserId=:updatedUserId, re.UpdatedDate=:updatedDate where re.RegisterNo=:registerNo and re.Active= true
select new redto ( re.RegisterNo ) from TLMORM00001 as re where re.RegisterNo =: RegisterNo and re.Active = true

select new redto ( re.RegisterNo, re.EncashNo, re.Ebank, re.Br_Alias, re.Type, re.Name, re.NRC, re.ToAccountNo, re.ToName, re.ToNRC, re.ToAddress, re.TestKey, re.Amount, re.Date_Time, re.IssueDate, re.AccountSign, re.UserNo, re.Budget, re.PrintStatus, re.PhoneNo, re.ToPhoneNo, re.UniqueId, re.SourceBranchCode, re.Currency, re.SettlementDate, re.Active, re.CreatedDate, re.CreatedUserId, re.UpdatedDate, re.UpdatedUserId ) from TLMORM00001 as re where re.ToAccountNo=:poNo and re.Budget=:budgetYear and re.SourceBranchCode=:sourcebr and re.Active=true

update TLMORM00001 re set re.IssueDate = :issuedate, re.EncashNo = :encashno, re.SettlementDate = :settlementdate, re.UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId, re.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate where re.RegisterNo = :registerNo and re.Active = true
select new redto ( re.RegisterNo, re.ToAccountNo ) from TLMORM00001 as re where re.ToAccountNo in (:polist) and re.Active = true

select new redto ( re.RegisterNo, re.Currency, re.Amount, re.ToAccountNo, re.ToName, re.Name, re.Ebank, re.SourceBranchCode ) from TLMORM00001 as re where Convert(char(10),re.Date_Time,111) = Convert(char(10),:datetime,111) and re.Type = :type and re.Ebank = :ebank and re.SourceBranchCode = :sourcebrcode and re.Active = true order by re.RegisterNo

select new redto ( re.RegisterNo, re.EncashNo, re.Currency, re.Amount, re.ToAccountNo, re.ToName, re.Name, re.ToNRC, re.NRC, re.Date_Time, re.Ebank, re.SourceBranchCode, re.PrintStatus, re.TestKey, re.Br_Alias, re.Type, re.ToAddress, re.AccountSign, re.Budget ) from TLMORM00001 as re where Convert(char(10),re.Date_Time,111) = :datetime and (re.ToAccountNo !=null and re.ToAccountNo != '') and (re.IssueDate != null and re.IssueDate != '') and re.SourceBranchCode = :sourcebrcode and re.Active = true order by re.ToAccountNo

select new redto ( re.RegisterNo, re.EncashNo, re.Ebank, re.Br_Alias, re.Type, re.Name, re.NRC, re.ToAccountNo, re.ToName, re.ToNRC, re.ToAddress, re.TestKey, re.Amount, re.Date_Time, re.IssueDate, re.AccountSign, re.UserNo, re.Budget, re.PrintStatus, re.PhoneNo, re.ToPhoneNo, re.UniqueId, re.SourceBranchCode, re.Currency, re.SettlementDate, re.Active, re.CreatedDate, re.CreatedUserId, re.UpdatedDate, re.UpdatedUserId ) from TLMORM00001 as re where re.Type = :type and (re.IssueDate is null or re.IssueDate = '') and re.SourceBranchCode =:sourceBranch and re.Active = true order by re.Ebank , re.Date_Time
select new redto ( re.RegisterNo, re.Active ) from TLMORM00001 as re where re.ToAccountNo = :acctno and re.Active = true
update TLMORM00001 re set re.PrintStatus=:printstatus, re.UpdatedUserId=:updatedUserId, re.UpdatedDate=:updatedDate where re.RegisterNo=:registerNo and re.Active= true
update TLMORM00001 re set re.RegisterNo =:registerno, re.UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId, re.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate where re.RegisterNo =:registerno_old and re.Active= true

select new redto ( re.RegisterNo, re.EncashNo, re.Ebank, re.Br_Alias, re.Type, re.Name, re.NRC, re.ToAccountNo, re.ToName, re.ToNRC, re.ToAddress, re.TestKey, re.Amount, re.Date_Time, re.IssueDate, re.AccountSign, re.UserNo, re.Budget, re.PrintStatus, re.PhoneNo, re.ToPhoneNo, re.UniqueId, re.SourceBranchCode, re.Currency, re.SettlementDate, re.Active, re.CreatedDate, re.CreatedUserId, re.UpdatedDate, re.UpdatedUserId ) from TLMORM00001 as re where (re.Date_Time!=null and re.Date_Time!='') and (re.IssueDate!= null and re.IssueDate!='') and re.SourceBranchCode=:SourceBranchCode and re.ToAccountNo not in (:polist) and re.Active = true
delete from TLMORM00001 as re where nullif(re.Date_Time,'')!= '' and nullif(re.IssueDate,'')!= '' and re.SourceBranchCode=:SourceBranchCode and re.ToAccountNo in (:polist) and re.Active = true

select new redto ( re.RegisterNo, re.Name, re.Currency, re.Amount, re.IssueDate, re.ToAccountNo, re.Active ) from TLMORM00001 as re where re.RegisterNo = :registerno and (re.ToAccountNo = null or re.ToAccountNo = '') and (re.IssueDate = null or re.IssueDate = '') and re.Active = true

update TLMORM00001 re set re.RegisterNo = :registerno, re.EncashNo = :encashno, re.ToAccountNo = :toaccountno, re.IssueDate = :issuedate, re.SettlementDate = :settlementdate, re.UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId, re.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate where re.RegisterNo = :registerno and re.Active = true

select new redto ( re.RegisterNo, re.EncashNo, re.Ebank, re.Br_Alias, re.Type, re.Name, re.NRC, re.ToAccountNo, re.ToName, re.ToNRC, re.ToAddress, re.TestKey, re.Amount, re.Date_Time, re.IssueDate, re.AccountSign, re.UserNo, re.Budget, re.PrintStatus, re.PhoneNo, re.ToPhoneNo, re.UniqueId, re.SourceBranchCode, re.Currency, re.SettlementDate, re.Active, re.CreatedDate, re.CreatedUserId, re.UpdatedDate, re.UpdatedUserId ) from TLMORM00001 as re where re.RegisterNo = :registerNo and re.SourceBranchCode = :sourceBr and re.Active = true

update TLMORM00001 re set re.Name = :name, re.NRC = :nrc, re.PhoneNo = :phone, re.ToName = :toName, re.ToNRC = :toNRC, re.ToAddress = :toAddress, re.ToPhoneNo = :toPhone, re.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate, re.UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId where re.RegisterNo = :registerNo and re.SourceBranchCode = :sourceBr and re.Active = true

update TLMORM00001 re set re.Amount = :amount, re.IssueDate = null, re.ToName = :name, re.ToNRC = :nrc, re.ToAddress = :address, re.ToPhoneNo = :phoneno, re.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate, re.UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId where re.RegisterNo = :registerNo and re.SourceBranchCode = :sourceBr and re.Active = true

update TLMORM00001 re set re.Amount = :amount, re.ToName = :name, re.ToNRC = :nrc, re.ToAddress = :address, re.ToPhoneNo = :phoneno, re.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate, re.UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId where re.RegisterNo = :registerNo and re.SourceBranchCode = :sourceBr and re.Active = true

update TLMORM00001 re set re.Active = false, re.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate, re.UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId where re.RegisterNo = :registerNo and re.SourceBranchCode = :sourceBr and re.Active = true

update TLMORM00001 re set re.IssueDate = null, re.ToAccountNo = null, re.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate, re.UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId where re.RegisterNo = :registerNo and re.SourceBranchCode = :sourceBr and re.Active = true

select new redto ( re.RegisterNo, re.EncashNo, re.Currency, re.Amount, re.ToAccountNo, re.ToName, re.Name, re.ToNRC, re.NRC, re.Date_Time, re.Ebank, re.SourceBranchCode, re.PrintStatus, re.TestKey, re.Br_Alias, re.Type, re.ToAddress, re.AccountSign, re.Budget ) from TLMORM00001 as re where re.RegisterNo = :registerNo and re.SourceBranchCode = :sourceBranch and re.Active = true
